item.title: A crash course on Serverless APIs with Express and MongoDB
item.description: Serverless has become an amazing tool for various use cases. Data processors, chatbots, APIs, you name it is now developed using serverless architectures. Today, I’ll walk you through creating a production-ready Express API running on AWS Lambda with a persistent MongoDB data store. Yes, that’s a thing, you can build Express apps on AWS Lambda. Amazing, I know! And yes, you can use MongoDB without batting an eye! It’s pretty straightforward when you think about it.
